description: Irregular triangular array: T(n,0) = 1 for n >= 1; T(n,1) = T(n,2) = 1 for n >= 1; T(n,k) = T(n-1,k-3) + T(n-1,k-2) + T(n-1,k-1) for 3 <= k <= 2n-1 and n >= 2; and T(n,2n) = T(n-1,2n-3) + T(n-1,2n-2) for n >= 2.
